name: Stephen CROOKS, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Crooks v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Stephen CROOKS, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 16th February, 2001, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order appealed is affirmed. The Motion for Court To Acquire Records In Conjunction With Writ of Mandamus is denied.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
768 A.2d 290
Stephen CROOKS, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 16, 2001.
